c:
He had loved her with all his heart, pouring his soul into their relationship. But she had never returned his love, not in the way he yearned for. He had held onto hope, believing that one day her feelings would change, that their love story would have a different outcome. However, reality had dealt him a cruel blow, ripping away the illusions he clung to. His heart shattered as he imagined her in another's embrace, ready to embark on a new journey without him.

The wedding card had arrived that morning. Mocking his pain, its golden letters gleamed brightly, almost taunting him. As he gazed at the card, a mix of anger, sadness, and resignation washed over him. The words on the card served as a bitter reminder of what might have been, of the life they could have shared together. As an embodiment of his shattered dreams, the card lay beside him.
